body_html: This is definitely supposed to be included in the tensorflow documentation, as said by @bwesen. It should also be included in the errors list. Is it possible for us do this in anyway? I think I am going to open a new issue, requesting to either add support for cuda 9.1, or mention that you need cuda 9.0 specifically in the docs, and also include this in the errors list

body: This is definitely supposed to be included in the tensorflow documentation, as said by @bwesen. It should also be included in the errors list. Is it possible for us do this in anyway? I think I am going to open a new issue, requesting to either add support for cuda 9.1, or mention that you need cuda 9.0 specifically in the docs, and also include this in the errors list
